articles.title: Edmonton Oilers put up a great fight, but still can't catch the Wild
articles.description: It could have been worse. After recent humiliating defeats against Central Division power teams, that might sound like the best that The Department of Moral Victories can come up with in the wake of Edmonton’s loss to the Minnesota Wild. But there were some genuine silver linings in that 1-0 defeat.

articles.title: Early Earth’s sky may have created the first ingredients for life
articles.description: Researchers recreated conditions from billions of years ago and found that Earth’s young atmosphere could make key molecules linked to life. articles.title: Doomed ants send a final scent to save their colony
articles.description: Ant pupae that are fatally sick don’t hide their condition; instead, they release a special scent that warns the rest of the colony.
